Body:
"""Test modify_storage_group_migration."""
with mock.patch.object(self.migration, 'modify_resource') as mock_mod:
    ref_options = dict()
    ref_options['action'] = 'LINK'
    ref_options['option'] = 'dummy_option'
    ref_options['executionOption'] = constants.ASYNCHRONOUS
    self.migration.modify_storage_group_migration(storage_group_name=self.
        data.storagegroup_name, action='LINK', options={'option':
        'dummy_option'}, _async=True)
    mock_mod.assert_called_once_with(category=constants.MIGRATION,
        resource_level=constants.SYMMETRIX, resource_level_id=self.conn.
        array_id, resource_type=constants.STORAGEGROUP, resource_type_id=
        self.data.storagegroup_name, payload=ref_options)
